pages.title: Spell Element
pages.text: You can say `element magic/fire/ice/earth/lightning/healing/necromancy/sorcery' or 'element arcane/blaze/frost/nature/storm/light/darkness/time` in your spell.

pages.title: Spell Element
pages.text: This means shape sigil or shape area for example will have circle of said element. This is purely cosmetic.

pages.title: Spell Element
pages.text: Example usage:$(br)`Mana, element fire, shape entity, ignite!`

pages.title: Effects & Sounds
pages.text: If you'll say 'remove/off effects/fx' in spell.$(br)Or add them back if you removed them earlier with 'add/on effects/fx'.

pages.title: Effects & Sounds
pages.text: Removing effects will remove appearing circle on your feet or one appearing in front of you, with also particles, and sounds.

pages.title: Spell Element
pages.text: Example usage:$(br)`Mana, off effects, shape entity, ignite!`
